name: phishing
remediationSteps:
Schedule patching during the next maintenance window.
Implement available mitigations.
Monitor security logs for potential exploitation.
Review and strengthen authentication mechanisms.
Implement multi-factor authentication if not already in place.
Audit password policies and enforce strong password requirements.

name: Phishing
remediationSteps:
URGENT: Immediate action required.
Consider taking affected systems offline until patched.
Implement emergency workarounds until a permanent fix is available.
Update to current cryptographic standards and algorithms.
Review key management practices.
Ensure proper implementation of cryptographic functions.
